data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 166,363 believers living in Fushun, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fushun, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 166,363 believers in Fushun, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Fushun, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: the county of Fushun has (about) 166,363 people who know Jesus, 35,428 people who know about him culturally, and 1,991,209 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Xibe people might believe through him.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Fushun, Liaoning, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Fushun with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the county of Fushun, Liaoning, China has a population of 2,193,000.

We estimate Fushun has 166,363 people who might know Jesus, 35,428 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,991,209 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Fushun access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
